bike.description: D-6 High Modulus Carbon monocoque, integrated oversized 1.5 lower head tube, 31.6mm round seat post, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: D-6 High Modulus Carbon, w/A4BL (Advanced 4 Bar Linkage) system 100mm travel, Cold forged dropout with CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots

components.description: ROCKSHOX Recon Gold RL Solo Air w/ Tapered Head Tube, 100mm Travel
Shimano SLX Hollow Tech II w/Integrated spindle, 24/32/42T
Shimano XT SGS Shadow Top normal 10sp
Shimano SLX CenterLock, 32H Hubs with Mavic XM-317 Disc Double Wall Rims
Shimano M575 Hydraulic Disc, 180/160mm Centerlock rotor
Shimano BL-M575 Hydraulic Forged Al Brake Lever
Oval M-600 15mm Sweep Double Butted 7050 Riser Bar 31.8mm
